title: AI Academy premium course & ebook sales website

requirements.text: Create a premium, high-end, trustworthy dark UI with royal blue/purple gradients, glassmorphism cards, smooth hover/scroll animations, and full mobile responsiveness; use professional typography (Poppins and/or Inter) and apply the style consistently across all pages/sections.

quotes: Colors: Black, Royal Blue, Purple gradient, White text

acceptanceCriteria: Site uses a dark theme with royal blue/purple gradient accents and white text, and the theme is visually consistent across all sections.
All primary content surfaces (cards/sections) use a glassmorphism-style treatment (blur/translucency) while maintaining readable contrast.
Buttons/cards have clear hover/focus states and subtle animation (e.g., transform/opacity) without harming performance.
Layout adapts cleanly to mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints.

requirements.text: Implement the homepage with the specified sections and exact hero copy/CTAs: Hero (heading ‚ÄúMaster AI & Digital Skills and Earn Online‚Äù, subtext ‚ÄúLearn AI, freelancing, and digital skills with practical courses & ebooks‚Äù, CTA buttons ‚ÄúView Courses‚Äù, ‚ÄúBuy Ebooks‚Äù, ‚ÄúJoin WhatsApp‚Äù), Featured Courses, Ebook Store, Why Choose AI Academy, Student Results/Testimonials, Pricing & Offers (combo/discount/limited-time), WhatsApp CTA banner, and Footer with about/contact/WhatsApp/social icons/copyright.

quotes: Big heading: ‚ÄúMaster AI & Digital Skills and Earn Online‚Äù
Subtext: Learn AI, freelancing, and digital skills with practical courses & ebooks

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage renders all requested sections in the same order (Hero, Featured Courses, Ebook Store, Why Choose, Testimonials/Results, Pricing & Offers, WhatsApp CTA, Footer).
Hero section displays the exact heading/subtext and three CTA buttons with the exact labels.
‚ÄúJoin WhatsApp‚Äù CTA navigates to WhatsApp chat for +91 8171739752.
Footer includes About AI Academy text area, contact info, a WhatsApp link/button, social media icon placeholders/links, and copyright line.

requirements.text: Add data-driven product listings for exactly 4 featured courses (AI Mastery Course, ChatGPT Earning Course, Freelancing Course, Instagram Growth Course) and exactly 4 ebooks (AI Tools Ebook, Online Earning Ebook, Freelancing Blueprint, Digital Marketing Ebook), each showing name, price, image, and a buy button; enable ‚ÄúView Courses‚Äù and ‚ÄúBuy Ebooks‚Äù hero CTAs to scroll/navigate to their respective sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Featured Courses section displays exactly 4 course cards with name, price, image, and a ‚ÄúBuy‚Äù action.
Ebook Store section displays exactly 4 ebook cards with name, price, cover image, and an ‚ÄúInstant Buy‚Äù action.
Clicking ‚ÄúView Courses‚Äù moves the user to the Featured Courses section; clicking ‚ÄúBuy Ebooks‚Äù moves the user to the Ebook Store section.
Catalog data is sourced from the backend so prices/images/titles can be updated centrally without rebuilding the frontend.

requirements.text: Implement WhatsApp contact integration across the site: all WhatsApp CTAs/buttons must open WhatsApp chat to +91 8171739752, including the dedicated WhatsApp CTA banner (‚ÄúNeed Help? Chat on WhatsApp‚Äù) and at least one persistent WhatsApp entry point (e.g., header or floating button).

quotes: Big banner: ‚ÄúNeed Help? Chat on WhatsApp‚Äù

acceptanceCriteria: All WhatsApp buttons/links open a WhatsApp chat to +91 8171739752 using a wa.me (or equivalent) URL.
A dedicated WhatsApp CTA banner section is present with the specified headline and a button to WhatsApp.
There is at least one additional WhatsApp entry point outside the banner (e.g., in header/footer or a floating button).

requirements.text: Add a purchase flow that supports the listed payment options (Razorpay, UPI, Paytm, Debit/Credit card) by presenting a checkout UI where users select a payment method and proceed; implement a configurable payment-link strategy per product/method (stored in backend configuration) that can redirect users to the appropriate external payment URL when available, and provide a fallback instruction state (e.g., ‚ÄúContact on WhatsApp‚Äù) when a link is not configured.

quotes:
üí≥ Payment Gateway Integration:

Add payment options:

Razorpay

UPI

Paytm

Debit/Credit card

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking buy on any course/ebook opens a checkout UI listing Razorpay, UPI, Paytm, and Debit/Credit card as payment options.
For each product+payment-method combination, the system can be configured with a payment URL in the backend and the frontend will redirect to it when present.
If a payment URL is missing for a chosen method, the UI shows a clear fallback path that includes a WhatsApp contact link to +91 8171739752.
Purchase attempts are recorded (e.g., created as an order/intent) in the backend with product, price at time of purchase, and chosen payment method.

requirements.text: Provide ‚Äúinstant ebook download after payment‚Äù via a backend-managed delivery mechanism: after a purchase is marked paid, the user can download the purchased ebook file from the frontend (served as a static asset) through a gated download link/token created by the backend; include a simple ‚ÄúMy Downloads‚Äù page that lists paid ebook purchases for the current session/principal and allows downloading.
acceptanceCriteria: There is a user-facing page/section (‚ÄúMy Downloads‚Äù or equivalent) that lists ebooks that have been marked paid and shows a download button for each.
Ebook files are served as static assets from the frontend build (not streamed through the backend), and download access is gated by a backend-issued token or authorization check.
Unpaid ebook purchases do not show active download buttons.

Backend stores purchase/payment status for ebook orders and can transition an order from unpaid to paid (initial implementation may include a simple internal/admin-only method or a temporary UI action clearly labeled as a placeholder until real payment confirmation is wired).

requirements.text: Add a Testimonials/Student Results section with 4‚Äì6 review cards and an ‚Äúearnings screenshots style‚Äù layout using provided/generated placeholder assets; ensure the section matches the premium glassmorphism theme and remains readable on mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials section shows between 4 and 6 testimonials with names/short quotes and a visual ‚Äúresults screenshot‚Äù style element per entry (or a subset).
Layout is responsive and maintains good spacing/typography on mobile.
Section styling matches the site theme (dark, gradient accents, glass cards).

requirements.text: Generate and include required static images (logo, hero background, product thumbnails/covers, testimonial-style result screenshots) and render them from frontend static assets; do not serve generated images from the backend.
acceptanceCriteria: All course cards show a thumbnail image; all ebook cards show a cover image; hero uses a premium background/visual.
Generated images are stored and referenced as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (or equivalent static public directory).
No backend endpoint is required to fetch or transform images at runtime.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (single-actor architecture).

Do not edit any files under frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui); compose/read from them instead.
Use English for all user-facing UI text.
nonGoals: Building a full learner dashboard with lesson streaming/progress tracking (not requested).
Implementing third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity (not requested).
Integrating a guaranteed real-time payment verification webhook flow for Razorpay/Paytm/UPI (requires external integrations not provided in the request).
Implementing real-time chat or push notifications.
